review: I wanted a good way to watch Netflix on my home TV. I already had a prime membership so that was an added bonus. My biggest problem I have is my wifi connection is not the best. I choose the fire due to the fact I can hook it straight to my router. Videos load fast and the quality is awesome. I have a huge selection of TV and movies yo watch with my memberships. The box is small so it doesn't take up much space. The remote is simple so you don't have to read a huge manual just to turn it on. The voice search works great. This is the best way to watch TV.
author: Code Seven

review: I am still getting used to the Fire TV, but so far I love it. I am still wary of "cutting the cord", but the more features of Fire TV that I discover, the more I am tempted to rely on it solely for my "TV". Some of the apps are wonderful and offer such a variety of viewing. The news apps are great as are the documentary apps. I would recommend it highly. I may be somewhat biased since I have been an Amazon customer for many years and love my Prime account very much. The Fire TV is a great buy.
